EnableClockHelp: Show local date and time in the top bar.
EnableBlurHashMoreHelp: Define the quality of blurring on a scale from 2 to 32 or choose the null value in order to disable it.
EnableBlurHashSomeMoreHelp: Defining a lower value should provide better performance.
EnableBackdropsHelp: Select the source of backdrops to display while browsing the library.
BackdropScreensaverHelp: Show the backdrops from the source defined above.
LogoScreensaverHelp: Show and animate a jellyfin logo.
